alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 9:43AM CDT until March 18 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Central Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 943 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Leakesville to 5 miles south of Beaumont, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chatom, Leakesville, Beaumont, McLain and Fruitdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
